Class HDBManager

java.lang.Object
bto.Entities.User
bto.Entities.HDBManager
public class HDBManager extends User
Represents an HDB manager in the BTO system.

The HDBManager class extends the User class and represents staff members who manage BTO projects. Managers can create, edit, and delete projects, approve or reject officer registrations and applications, manage project visibility, and generate reports.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBManager

      public HDBManager()
      Default constructor for creating an HDBManager. Initializes an empty list of managed projects.

    • HDBManager

      public HDBManager(String nric, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, String name)
      Creates an HDBManager with specified personal information.
      Parameters:
      nric - The manager's National Registration Identity Card number
      password - The manager's password for system access
      age - The manager's age
      maritalStatus - The manager's marital status
      name - The manager's name

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(Project projectDetails)
      Creates a new BTO project with the provided details.

      Checks for overlapping application periods with existing projects managed by this manager before creating a new project.

      Parameters:
      projectDetails - The details of the project to create
      Returns:
      The created project, or null if creation failed

    • editProject

      public boolean editProject(Project project, String attribute, Object newValue)
      Edits a specific attribute of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to edit
      attribute - The name of the attribute to edit
      newValue - The new value for the attribute
      Returns:
      true if the edit was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes an existing project managed by this manager.

      Also removes all references to this project from registrations, applications, and enquiries.

      Parameters:
      project - The project to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public boolean toggleProjectVisibility(Project project)
      Toggles the visibility of a project.

      When a project is visible, applicants can see and apply for it.

      Parameters:
      project - The project whose visibility to toggle
      Returns:
      true if the visibility was toggled successfully, false otherwise

    • approveRegistration

      public boolean approveRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Approves an officer registration for a project.

      Checks if there are available officer slots in the project before approval.

      Parameters:
      registration - The officer registration to approve
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful, false otherwise

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(ProjectApplication application)
      Approves an application for a project.

      Checks if there are available units of eligible flat types before approval.

      Parameters:
      application - The application to approve
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful, false otherwise

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(ProjectApplication application)
      Rejects an application for a project.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to reject
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was successful, false otherwise

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(ProjectApplication application)
      Approves a withdrawal request for an application.

      If the application status is BOOKED, releases the flat back into the available pool.

      Parameters:
      application - The application with a pending withdrawal
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal(ProjectApplication application)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application with a pending withdrawal
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was successful, false otherwise

    • ownProjects

      public List<Project> ownProjects(List<Project> allProjects, HDBManager currentManager)
      Filters all projects to find those managed by the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      allProjects - List of all projects in the system
      currentManager - The manager whose projects to filter for
      Returns:
      List of projects managed by the specified manager

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A report containing filtered booking information

    • respondToEnquiry

      public boolean respondToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Responds to an enquiry.

      Checks if the enquiry is valid and related to a project managed by this manager.

      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to respond to
      Returns:
      true if the response was recorded successfully, false otherwise

      public Project getManagedProject()
      Gets the first managed project, if any.

      This is a legacy method maintained for backward compatibility.

      Returns:
      The first managed project, or null if none exist

    • setManagedProject

      public void setManagedProject(Project project)
      Sets the managed project list to contain only the specified project.
